SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui

Class TUIUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.TUIUtils
public class TUIUtils extends Object
Utility class for TUI, responsible for pretty-printing the game state.
Each time we print the board state, we expect to receive a prompt to display for the user input and a possibly null error message.
The TUI is made up of various elements, each a String separated by newlines. They can be joined vertically and horizontally to compose the entire menu.

  • Method Details

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      Clear the console, by either calling the cls executable on Windows or by using ANSI escape codes on Unix.
      Note that this is not necessarily supported on all systems, and may not work depending on your terminal emulator.

    • printLoginScreen

      public static void printLoginScreen(String prompt, String error)
      Print the login screen.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to display
      error - The error message to display, or null if there is no error

    • printGame

      public static void printGame(String nickname, String prompt, String error)
      Print the main game state.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player playing the game.
      prompt - The prompt to display
      error - The error message to display, or null if there is no error

    • printEndGameScreen

      public static void printEndGameScreen(EndGameMessage.EndGamePayload endgame, String firstPlayer)
      Print the end game leaderboard.
      Parameters:
      endgame - The contents of the EndGameMessage received from the server.
      firstPlayer - The nickname of the first player in the game. (The one who started the game)

    • concatString

      public static String concatString(String s1, String s2, int space)
      Join two TUI elements horizontally
      Parameters:
      s1 - The first element
      s2 - The second element
      space - The number of spaces between the two elements
      Returns:
      The two elements joined horizontally

    • createBox

      public static String createBox(String input, String color)
      Create a colored box around the input string.
      Parameters:
      input - The string to put in the box
      color - The color of the box
      Returns:
      The input string surrounded by a box

    • generateTiles

      public static String generateTiles(List<Tile> tiles)
      Generate the TUI representation of a list of tiles.
      Used to display tiles once they have been selected.
      Parameters:
      tiles - The list of tiles to represent
      Returns:
      The TUI representation of the tiles

    • generateSelection

      public static String generateSelection(List<Coordinate> selection)
      Weapper for generateTiles(), mapping coordinates to tiles using the board.
      Parameters:
      selection - The list of coordinates to represent
      Returns:
      The TUI representation of the tiles

    • generateChat

      public static String generateChat()
      Generate the TUI representation of the chat.
      Chat is displayed on the right side of the screen in a separate box.
      Returns:
      The TUI representation of the chat

      Personal goals are a smaller version of the normal shelves.
